channel.title: Welcome to exploiting croissants hub! on exploiting croissants

item.title: Projects
item.description: exploiting-croissants releases # Here’s the list of my currently available projects that I have done so far (all of them being available via my github repo): Kipferl-OS/Privacy-oriented-Personal-Device-Experience-Project-PPDEP Learn how and why today’s consumer smartphones do not prove to offer or guarantee a private environment regarding personal data processing that is happening on that particular smartphone device. null 0 0 Kipferl-OS/Pi-Hole-on-Android-through-linux-image-server There’s no OS involved really, I just like succumbing myself in whatever distribution comes handy, I may even develop an obsession for it.

item.title: This is just a test article
item.description: As stated in the other articles, this is currently a work-in-progress (both the full release of the website and its contents). Stay tuned once the extension of the exploiting croissants’ blog is fully released, along with its articles! Cheers & mind the brain üòÑ!

item.title: About the exploiting croissants initiative
item.description: Check the description ‚¨áÔ∏è # This page is currently a work in progress (I am still trying to find a cool way of displaying my contact information, I guess that’s my personal issue here). That being said, you can still write “summary” on the terminal version of the website and fetch my contact card, or if you want to jump straight to the point, you can simply access my GitHub repo.
